term.line2: Detection / Defense / Governance / Ethical Offense: ACTIVE ✅

hero.title: Guy-Dorlant MOUBAGHOU-MANGUI
hero.sub: Cloud & Cybersecurity Engineer — Network & Threat Defense
hero.p: I design secure architectures, detect threats, perform ethical attacks to strengthen systems, and prepare organizations for high-level cybersecurity.

skills.title: Cyber Skills
skills.tagline: Hybrid Red/Blue. Cloud & Network Defense. Identity-First Security. Governance & Risk.

items.title: SOC / SC-200
items.text: Sentinel, KQL, XDR, SOAR, incident response.

items.title: Azure Security / AZ-500
items.text: Zero Trust, Defender for Cloud, Key Vault, NSG/WAF.

items.title: Offensive / CEH
items.text: Nmap, DVWA, Burp, MITM, WPA2, Wireshark.

items.title: Governance, Risk & Compliance
items.text: Policies, ISO 27005 Risk Register, IR Playbook, Audit.

projects.title: Projects & Labs
projects.tagline: Concrete excerpts (Case Files). Full details coming in their dedicated page.

cards.title: SOC — RDP Brute-force Detection
cards.desc: KQL rule + SOAR playbook, Sentinel dashboard & incident report.

cards.title: Azure Zero Trust Lab
cards.desc: Conditional Access, Defender for Cloud, Key Vault.

cards.title: CEH — DVWA Exploit & Mitigation
cards.desc: Burp Suite workflow + remediation & OWASP mapping.

about.title: About
about.intro: I’m a 5th-year engineering student (ESAIP) focused on Cloud & Cybersecurity. I connect SOC, Azure Security, IAM and GRC to real use cases and build a portfolio of labs aligned with my certifications.
about.status_text: Goals 2025/26: apprenticeship or first role in SOC/Cloud Security, then a path toward a future CISO role.

certs.title: Certifications
certs.tagline: Validated and in-progress certifications aligned with my labs (SOC, Azure, IAM, GRC, Offensive).
